locations.name: Harolds Chicken Shack
locations.address: 612 S Wabash Ave, Chicago, IL 60605, USA
reviews: Food was amazing. The host taking my order was extremely polite and sweet as she could be.  It was a little slow to get but worth the wait.  Only critique I have is it smelled a little like a nursing home inside.  But the food was fantastic.

Mac and cheese chicken bowl was terrible. No flavor, pasta was hard and they melted some mozzarella cheese (at least I think) on top. Also, the wings too salty. Harold‚Äôs in name only and not quality of food. Need to eliminate some of the menu to focus more on the quality of food. Took chicken nuggets out of bowl but they were not good either.
This location seems to be better than the other ones i‚Äôve visited. I picked up my order and it was the best while eaten hot! The flavor was there and the chicken was decent. Will visit again!

They used to be good now they are nasty. My mom called about her food which was still warm btw since the large Mexican girl wanted to think it was cold. That catfish crumbled up like dust!!! My shrimp was overcooked and she didn‚Äôt want to give me a refund but gave a refund on the fish. No I brought back everything but it‚Äôs ok I‚Äôll try to corporate number but I‚Äôll dispute with my bank. Shorty that‚Äôs more money in my pockets when I call my bank

I used to be a regular here in the mid 80‚Äôs when I lived in Hyde Park. Loved the hot chicken with fries and hot sauce poured all over the chicken and fries. Brought back great memories 40 years later to see it was still here and same great taste.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack West Loop
locations.address: 1501 W Madison St, Chicago, IL 60607, USA
reviews: I can never leave home without stopping at Harold‚Äôs.The food tastes just like I remember growing up. I got a perch and wing meal with mild sauce and then a 6 piece wing for the next day. It was busy due to it being the night before Christmas. Ordered before I got there and everything was hot and ready. If only there was a location near me üò© Everything was outstanding.

Ordered my food online and it was ready at the given time. There is plenty of paid street parking but if you run in and run out you can probably avoid having to pay. The cashier greeted me and he was pleasant. My order was correct. The fries and chicken were piping hot, fried correctly, and fresh.

I hadn't ate Harolds in maybe 5 years before today. I just think there are better options for the price. $10 for 4 wings and fries is a bit much to not be perfect. The chicken was hot and fresh but lacked flavor. The only seasoning I tasted was the salt and pepper I requested.

Would I eat it again? Yes. But it will probably be another 5 years.

I ordered 6 wings (mild sauce on side + hot pepper) via Uber Eats and this is what was delivered to me. 5 tiny wings and a handful of fries. For $30 on the app (I get fees and all). But what a disappointment! Please do better!

The restaurant is good for a snack. There is a big menu but unfortunately they only had fries as sides available (maybe because we joined for only lunch).
The wings with its mild sauce was very good.

This place is extremely famous for their chicken and we were quite happy with the food! We tried their shrimp, chicken tenders, wings, green tomatoes and hush-puppies. Everything tasted good even if the mild sauce was a little too mild, adding little taste. It is possible to park in the from of the restaurant and the area looked okay. If you are in the area you should give it a try!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 2132 S Michigan Ave, Chicago, IL 60616, USA
reviews: I ordered  gizzard and Wings, the wings  was great but the gizzard was if they were out the freezer microwave them fried ti add batter which might understand the wait after it was a phone order first. I tried to call but no answer and the voicemail is full. I like to have the business correct any mistakes first before I post a comment. Also a coworker on the same ordered Livers was so dark as if dark grease was used. FYI, if gizzards are not popular delete them from your menu! I would've order fish & wing.

Food is amazing, service is super slow. The ladies behind the counter have no sense of urgency, not a care in the world. Waited over an hour, as people kept coming in she would tell them that the wait is only 20 minutes. She would ask customers to speak up when ordering, but when she called the numbers she would whisper.  Management needs to do better.

It was about a 40 minute wait for my food which is understandable because it was after a bears game. I didn‚Äôt expect too much coming into this restaurant but man I was blown away by those chicken wings and mild sauce. Some of the best chicken wings I‚Äôve ever had. Fries were a little bland and didn‚Äôt have salt which maybe you could‚Äôve asked for some but they put sauce on them too which made them better. Overall a great experience and I‚Äôd definitely eat here again.

My order is always the same, but today, I tried something different. 6 Wings, salt, pepper, and lemon pepper. Mild sauce on the side. This was more expensive than my typical 6 Wings, salt, pepper, lemon pepper and mild sauce. I stated just put the sauce on the chicken. I waited 30 minutes for my order. I got home and there wasn‚Äôt a drop of mild sauce on my chicken! But, I was charged for it. I‚Äôm disappointed! Couple this with fact last my order was mixed up with someone else‚Äôs order and was fried hard with pepper juice on it. The wait time, unpleasant attitudes, and order mishaps always ruin this experience for me. They collect your receipt to redeem your food which would make it difficult to resolve the issue once you‚Äôve walked out the restaurant.

üó£Ô∏èTRASHHHHHHHHH!

Went there to get a lemon pepper fried hard wing dinner  and salt and pepper wing dinner- started eating the chicken and saw that it was still raw on the inside- no lemon pepper in sight - no fried hard. I took it right back and  told them to look at it. Instead of them delivering good customer service and remaking  the order - they made me wait 30 mins while they made every new customer order - when I asked how much longer on the order the young woman at the woman caught an attitude.   I simply wanted to know much longer I needed to wait for a remake. 10 minutes after this‚Ä¶. Then- Some crip keeper man come out the back talking about - ‚Äúwe not gon service you no mo-‚Äú at this point I just want my money back- so now we have to have a debate about that. Terrible customer service and they never know who they are servicing üòâ. I had to tell the lady calm down at the window, stop yelling and give me money back- a whole hour+ from the initial order to returning it  to finally getting my refund. I had to go to the one on Wabash and Harrison just so I could get my kid her wings and fries. Horrible!!!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken #55
locations.address: 129 W 87th St, Chicago, IL 60620, USA
reviews:
You can never visit Chicago without stopping at a Harold‚Äôs Chicken! This Express location is mainly takeout.  Seating is available, but it‚Äôs mostly for waiting for your order.

Once I looked over the menu, I was ready to order. I‚Äôll be honest, the ordering process was a little awkward at first. It was hard to tell if the cashier was ready, and I got a very faint ‚Äúmay I help you.‚Äù I placed my order, and there was no response at first, which made me laugh a little. After a short pause, she entered the order. When I asked a question about a few of the menu items, the response was very brief. Not the warmest interaction, but hey, I was there for the food.

And the food absolutely delivered!  We ordered a 10-piece wing dinner with fries, catfish dinner with fries, and fried okra. Each order came with their signature white bread and ‚Äúmini‚Äù Cole slaw.

Everything came out hot, fresh, and cooked just right. Nothing was overcooked, the seasoning was on point, and the sauce was perfect, not too thick and not too thin.

‚ÄúMmm delicious‚Äù is truly an understatement. Despite the minimal customer service, the food quality alone makes this spot worth it. I highly recommend this restaurant if you want classic Harold‚Äôs flavor done right.

We stopped here for early lunch.
Ordered 2-7 pc chicken wing dinners with mild sauce.
Food was up in a matter of about 20-25 minutes. Presentation was totally inviting. Yummy hot golden wings / fries with just the right amount of sauce. (drenched)
Wings were crunchy and juicy.
The fries were perfect. Oh let's not leave out that hidden slice of bread that was at the bottom covered in that special Harold's secret sauce. Entire meal was chef's kiss of carry out.  Simply delicious.

I've heard that this is the best location. I tend to agree.

I have been searching for a good Harold‚Äôs since the location on 14th and Michigan closed down. Before trying any restaurant, l always read the reviews.  Despite the 3.9 rating, I decided to give this location a try and I was highly impressed! I went around 6pm on New Year‚Äôs Eve and baby it was CROWDED,  so I knew the food was going to be HOT & FRESH!!  AND IT WAS!!! I ordered 4 wings fried hard with mild sauce and black pepper.  The wings were crispy and tasted so clean - no funny aftertaste. The fries were cooked to perfection. Their mild sauce was good, not too tart or sweet. My wait time was roughly 30 minutes which wasn‚Äôt bad at all considering the day. The cashier and other staff were pleasant - nobody had a stank attitude. Overall, my experience was AWESOME‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
This is definitely my new go-to Harold‚Äôs!!!üëçüèΩüëåüèΩüó£Ô∏èSPREAD THE WORD!!!

I‚Äôm a truck driver who works out of Chicago and I was bobtailing and I decided hey, it‚Äôs right off the freeway, why not stop here to grab something to eat. I loved it. Chicken was hot and fresh. My only regret was not getting extra mild sauce. I‚Äôd come back.

Sorry about the pic quality but still. it was good.

This came from an Uber Eats order today, and the chicken is old and smelly. It‚Äôs supposed to be for my toddler. I wouldn‚Äôt give this to a dog.
Updated response: This review was meant for #55 express, and not this location #55. However, if the owner is the same, they need a lot on the other side of the expressway because the meal was unacceptable.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #36 (Wicker Park)
locations.address: 1361 N Milwaukee Ave, Chicago, IL 60622, USA
reviews:
While visiting Chicago I was able to visit Harold‚Äôs Chicken #36. I ordered it the ‚ÄúChicago way‚Äù ‚Äî salt, pepper, mild sauce. It was fresh out the fryer, which already earned it points before the first bite. I was the very first customer so the order took some time which they warned me of when I placed my order.

The chicken itself was the highlight. Super crispy on the outside ‚Äî Juicy and cooked perfectly. It was fresh and made to order.

Once you got past the outer crisp, the meat itself was a bit plain. Not bad by any means ‚Äî just‚Ä¶ lacking the flavor I'm use to. I assume this is because the sauce is the overall highlight.

Now let‚Äôs talk about that mild sauce. I know it‚Äôs a Chicago tradition and a Harold‚Äôs signature, but it didn‚Äôt really do it for me. It had a slightly sweet, tomato-forward taste that reminded me a little too much of ketchup that's diluted with vinegar. Not terrible, just not the flavor bomb I was expecting. It kind of coated everything without elevating it. I prefer MUMBO sauce wayyyyyy more.

All in all, I‚Äôm glad I tried it. It‚Äôs part of the culture, and the freshness and texture alone made it worth the stop. But if we‚Äôre talking strictly about flavor, it didn‚Äôt quite live up to the hype for me.

Final Verdict: Worth the experience, but not a must-have repeat.

Rating: 7.8/10

I THINK this is one of the original Harold‚Äôs of Chicago:   THINK.

Absolutely drop dead traditional made to order only fried chicken.   Priced right, carry it out and always tip your bartenders well.

When you look beyond the exterior and the restaurant itself and just focus on the food  this place is the almost perfect place for fried chicken , the portions in comparison to the price is amazing , the tenders are HUGE and juicy and their bbq is AMAZING. And the fries are also tasty, I would eat from there over and over again. It is good to note it is a TAKE OUT place. Don‚Äôt expect to sit in.
I ask for lemon pepper I guess I got it right I mean right what do wild see. This is my first time ever in Chicago tasting this if I‚Äôm wrong let me know

If you just care about going from hungry to full with delicious food at a fair price. This place does just that.

Ordering ahead and picking up to go is probrably the best way to get food here.

Pros: Perfectly fried and seasoned fish and chicken, generous portions. The chicken was juicy and crispy and not too heavy. Usually fried catfish is tough to get right but here it was perfectly balanced with tenderness and juicyness and crispyness.

Cons: Limited dine-in capability, fresh to order meals take at least 20min (was worth the wait).

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Hyde Park
locations.address: Kimbark Plaza Parking Lot, 1208 E 53rd St, Chicago, IL 60615, USA
reviews: Great tasting chicken but, damn do the employees have to pay for sauce out of pocket? This chicken is way too dry for the price!! Also, if you ask for more sauce they force you to buy extra in a cup which is not the same and defeats the purpose of adding sauce while the food is hot! I‚Äôm giving a 1 star because, this is not how original Harold‚Äôs is served!

Normally I can order my food and pick it up without a problem but today when I went to pick up my order, I tried to tell one of the women, looks to be in her 40s, that I made an order and when I said my name, she ignored me and started calling numbers from 62 to 67, and then another woman walks up and said she called in an order, now another woman in the back gets her food and I‚Äôm trying to get mine after her but the older woman just calling numbers, still ignoring me. I finally tell the younger woman I ordered through grub hub and I tell her my name like I told the other woman and she gets my food for me. I don‚Äôt know what the older lady‚Äôs problem was but she needs to get better customer service skills or stop working the register. It doesn‚Äôt take a lot just to learn to listen  and stop ignoring people especially when they‚Äôre not disrespectful. I won‚Äôt be coming back here ever again.
I purchased 5 wings and they were pretty decent but the fries were hard, dry, and some what soggy. Can't eat chicken from harolds if fries not right. Places since Covid have really went down

Not going to lie I gave up on this Harold‚Äôs years ago because the food quality and service had fallen off. But today I decided to give it another chance and ordered 15 wings. The line was long but they were moving people in and out quick. And honestly‚Ä¶ they made a comeback. The chicken was fye, fresh, and crunchy just how I like it. Even my 5-year-old said Mama this chicken fye

I ordered a fourth white with just lemon pepper I received what looked like a fried rat with a bunch of sauce ,this Harolds has went really down and when you try to call, they don‚Äôt pick up the phone. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this place at all.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken #88
locations.address: 124 E 35th St, Chicago, IL 60616, USA
reviews: Chicken is good but every time I go there I ask them did they put my coleslaw in the bag and they always lie and say they did. I open the bag in front of them EVERY TIME and it‚Äôs never in there! Why lie about that? And yall charging 50 cent for it and don‚Äôt wanna give it out.

Chicken was good but the fries was trash. I don‚Äôt feel like you should re-drop French fries because they look like the picture I‚Äôm attaching. Smh. Very disappointing when a 6 wing is 15$ and you can‚Äôt even eat the fries!!

We were in Chicago on vacation and our first stop was to Harold‚Äôs Chicken off 35th street. James the owner was super nice.  We had gizzards, liver, cat fish, coleslaw, wings and grapes with toffee. EVERYTHING was delicious!! The grapes were surprisingly delicious. The sauce did not disappoint! I‚Äôd recommend you check out Harold‚Äôs Chicken on 35th street.

I love Harold's ‚ù§Ô∏è My order was hot, fresh, and quick. The service was great from beginning to end. I ordered 2 6 piece wing dinners, which included fries and their famous mild sauce. It was delicious like always.

I went in and ordered two 6 wings. these people gave me a 4 wing and a 6 wing. I would‚Äôve been cool with it if they put the right stuff on top. They gave me all hot sauce and hella salt and pepper on my wings. WHO GOES TO HAROLDS AND ONLY GETS HOT SAUCE ON THEIR CHICKEN???? Harold‚Äôs is known for MILD SAUCE. The cashiers are just dumb ditzy ho‚Äôs. Then they have the nerve to not answer their phone. Horrible service and horrible food. Im blew asl. Looking at my receipt she charged me for stuff i didn‚Äôt asked for the lady was old but if she‚Äôs too old to comprehend simple requests then she needs to be fired.

locations.name: Harold‚Äôs Chicken Shack
locations.address: 917 W 87th St, Chicago, IL 60620, USA
reviews: Man ü§© idk what it is about this specific Harold's Chicken location but it hits Everytime! I got the 1/2 white dinner and when I tell you every piece of chicken was fire that's exactly what I mean! Always loved their food and variety. Only thing is I feel their wings can be too expensive vs the actual dinners cause I feel like you're getting a better value when you get the dinner over the wings but other then that they are definitely excellent and a Chicago staple üëåüèæ

This location use to be good but has drastically gone in the wrong direction! I ordered 6 wings extra mild sauce which I was charged for the chicken was hard and old looking with very little sauce. I went bk and the was giving garbage again. It's 2025 and don't nobody have money to waste so it's safe to say that I won't be patronizing this business again.

Haven‚Äôt had any Harold‚Äôs Chicken in years. I‚Äôm not a chicken person but I tired it. I use to go to this location a lot like years ago. The cashier was cool and the inside is the inside. It‚Äôs not finna b all brand new this is Harold‚Äôs Chicken we talking about in the trenches. It was busy that‚Äôs to b expected. My favorite Harold‚Äôs !! Love their sauce so baddd , just be packed whenever I go but it‚Äôs worth it !!!

They think they the best Harold‚Äôs in the city. So they keep going up on they prices and this time they put my mild sauce on the side. I said salt paper and mild sauce never said on the side! Bad Business owner and worker even worst!

locations.name: Berwyn Harold's Chicken & Bar
locations.address: 6307 W 26th St, Berwyn, IL 60402, USA
reviews: The chicken was fresh and hot, the lemon pepper was delicious and of quality. The customer service was excellent üëå and the vibe was pleasant. This place is unique and brilliant!

First time coming to a Harolds like this. I traveled 50 miles to get to a harolds as it's been over 5 years since having some. The food was so hot and fresh. The atmosphere was nice came on a Sunday during the football game. Nice crowd. Be patient as the food is made to order expect to wait 20-25 mins. Would come again.

This place is weird but in a good way. Where better to have a Harold Chicken than in a ‚Ä¶car wash/detailing center/Bar? Crazy, right?  Now the chicken. It‚Äôs everything you expect. Delicious, hot and fresh. They make everything on demand so it‚Äôll take like 20 min for your food to cook if you are ordering for more than 1 person. They people here are super friendly and that‚Äôs a big plus for me. Been here like 3 or 4 times now and the food never disappoints.

I ordered online and walked over to pickup.  The food was on time, hot, fresh, and delicious.  Maybe they had a rocky start? but I didn't experience any of the problems people have mentioned in other reviews.  Plenty of sauce (I ordered it on-the-side), and not greasy-- even the lone piece of white bread on the bottom of the bucket wasn't.

Will be going back.

I got a full car wash and they left it all dirty. They didn‚Äôt clean the inside at all and the outside was still dirty and wet. They spend around an hour to be done with it and they left it worse than it was. The inside was left wet with stains. My car key fob was push all the way inside and I was unable to press the lock button like if they had stepped on it. The good reviews are probably for the food and not the car wash. The trunk was not touch at all. Not worth $40.

locations.name: Harold's ‚ÄúThe Fried Wing King ‚Äú
locations.address: 1118 W Wilson Ave, Chicago, IL 60640, USA
reviews: This is a Chicago staple. I got buy 2 get 2 free on Doordash. However, I have dined in before too.

This place is a total scam. I ordered a buy 1-get-1 chicken sandwich offer from uber eats.  They put a long piece of fried chicken (half of which was paper thin) and placed 4 buns on it. A total of 8 fries. They completely ripped me off. If they're cutting corners on their specials, what other shady stuff are they doing? Don't eat here.

They get away with the high pries because this is the Northside and the people don't know any better. You play more and get less at this location and it don't taste like Harold's for real. I ordered here off Uber Eats. Supposed to be a buy one, get one free catfish nuggets meal. Come to find out they only give you 5 nuggets and combine both orders in one tray. With only 1 order of French fries. Now I never heard of a 5 piece cat fish nugget. It's usually just large or small. The fact that you would charge that price for small pieces is crazy. I suggest people avoid this place and go out south or to the Harold's on West Howard. Better prices and taste like real Harold's.

This Harold‚Äôs food is decent, but the problem I have is that they are flexing a proud black owned badge in the window, but the workers are Caucasian frying the chicken, yes very strange. And she‚Äôs doing a great job, although she‚Äôs working alone as the cashier and also the cook. So please don‚Äôt be in a hurry coming here.
Cook is very white not black the reply is a lie, also ordered wings from here 12/22/25 and the wings were not seasoned , I ordered them with out sauce on purpose so I could taste them without distraction, they were unseasoned and tasted like the oil needed to be changed
Ordered through Uber eats. Did not receive coleslaw or bread and catfish had ketchup all over it. Ketchup should‚Äôve been on the side. No answer when I called restaurant mailbox is full

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #35
locations.address: 12700 S Halsted St, Chicago, IL 60628, USA
reviews:
My first time ordering here. I went in it wasn't very crowded. I saw 3 people waiting. THE MUSIC was blasting I could barely hear the lady taking my order. Ordered 5 wings salt pepper mild on side. Amazing chicken. They also sell deep fried catfish and they are really good. The location is a bit far from Downtown but still reachable. Must try place if you are in Chicago.

I did not enjoy my experience here. I followed the hype, from Tik Tok, and wanted to get a taste of Chicago. I ordered the 4 piece wings and fries. I threw my fries in the trash. My fries were not hot. The chicken is mediocre. Nothing that made me feel like it was good chicken. Honestly,it felt like a waste. I‚Äôm open to trying another time and maybe another location one day.

Ordered 18 wings waited 20 minutes‚Ä¶ cool! Get the food it wasn‚Äôt hot as if they just fried it‚Ä¶ get home it‚Äôs pieces of paper in it and it looks as if they broke down orders they had that people hadn‚Äôt picked up and made me a an 18 piece‚Ä¶ fries weren‚Äôt hot and they put so much sauce on it to try to cover up the fact that it wasn‚Äôt fresh chicken‚Ä¶ the sauce isn‚Äôt what it use to be it was kinda bitter‚Ä¶ big disappointment had to put it in the air fryer because I didn‚Äôt want to hand it back and they play with it or get a refund and go somewhere else because it wasn‚Äôt fresh chicken already after 10pm‚Ä¶. But I will not be getting anything else from this location!!!! They‚Äôre supposed to have insurance for spoilage not push it off on a loyal customer‚Ä¶.sad!!!

The food and service was great, but while I was ordering, a man that works here came in loudly yelling and cursing at the lady that was taking my order and everyone in the lobby could hear him yelling. The man in back was extremely unprofessional and abusive to the lady that was taking orders. I‚Äôm not sure if he‚Äôs a manager, but if he is he needs to be fired immediately. locations.name: Chicago Lawn Harold's Chicken #17
locations.address: 2900 W 63rd St, Chicago, IL 60629, USA
reviews: New night manager is rude blocked my number from calling the store I ordered food to feed my kids and online the options are different from her poor excuse for messing up my order why give me bland chicken then claim it‚Äôs a charge for sauce on the side not on the chicken I have a toddler that doesn‚Äôt like sauce on his food how is one cup of sauce enough for a 24 piece and fries then she claimed they are not able to add lemon pepper on the side in app it said free but I got up charge for one sauce. Mind you this is my 10th time eating at this one will not order from here again chicken didn‚Äôt look like it normally does either highly frustrated
It was great and the $2 chicken only on Tuesday and $1.50 on Wednesday is great for everybody in need of some good fried chicken! So your and fresh made to order! Right on time!

Today was my first time here and I must say that the food was good,  hot, fresh, and  the service was speedy! They give you a nice amount of fries, one piece of bread, and cole slaw upon request. Definitely will go back and the inside was clean of you wanted to eat in there! Parking is hard to get since it's other businesses in that small area!

One of my favorite Harold‚Äôs! I‚Äôve never had an issue ordering ahead and picking up. The food has been consistent‚Ä¶except the okra. Please change be back to the original okra. Thank you to the staff for being great always!
I just landed at Chicago Midway Airport, and I'm hungry. I'm a native of Chicago, and I know where to find the eats. These wings were on point. Enough said.  üçó

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #69
locations.address: 9938 S Torrence Ave, Chicago, IL 60617, USA
reviews: Ms. Gina was a delight to speak with. She explained her way is a fresh drop when ordered. Definitely had some of the best tasting chicken.  With them dropping fresh. She said she needs 25 with anything with a bone in it.

The customer service there is horrible and awful. I will never set foot in there again.  I hope they are shut down.  I received my order (which was a delivery btw) and it was wrong! I ordered six wings with mild sauce and paid extra for extra sauce. I get my order and it‚Äôs completely dry!  I get in my car (which is an inconvenience) and drive up there. I‚Äôm met with an attitude and  hostility, all because THEY messed up my order.  No apology or nothing. At the end of the day, I want what I ordered and should not have to argue with the employee that messed up the order. The young man who runs it when his mom is not there needs to be fired.   IT BE YOUR OWN PEOPLE.

To save from writing a book about this place, the easiest way to put it is, save your money and your time by going somewhere else if you don't want to be disappointed!

Highly disappointed in the lack of flavor!!! There was no seasoning whatsoever. The restaurant was clean and the customer service was excellent!! The chicken was hot and fresh but it was the most flavorless Harold's I have ever had. Unfortunately, I will not be returning to this location.

Very unprofessional customer services Issa keeps a business open. You can‚Äôt have cashier unaware of what menu items are not available before taking a customer money and having them wait thirty minutes. locations.name: Harold's Chicken #24

reviews: I called my order in the cashier told me 20 mins I took 35 mins to come. I came in no line empty still waited 8 mins. That Lady attitude and her customer service is horrible, I see why I done walked in a couple of times and customers is cussing her out. Black business customer service needs to do better or go find something else!

Another important thing: the chicken is fresh, so it takes about 25 minutes to prepare, but the wait is absolutely worth it in the end. The buy-one-get-one offer on the 6-piece wings was awesome too.

One suggestion from a customer: please consider extending store hours. People like me who work night shifts or late hours would really appreciate it if the store stayed open until 1:00 AM. It would be great for town residents and late-night workers.

Overall, great experience, great food, and great service.

reviews: Harold‚Äôs Chicken Avondale is the perfect spot for chicken wings. Arguably the best chicken restaurant in Picnic Digital Food Court. We order the 8 Piece Wings, Large Fries, and Mild sauce. The chicken was cooked up quickly and was both crispy and flavorful! We will be back for more soon!

I genuinely tried to give the new Harold‚Äôs in Avondale a fair chance. I‚Äôve been eating Harold‚Äôs from different locations across Chicago for over 20 years, so I know the classic Harold‚Äôs flavor, texture, and quality. Even after seeing the string of 1-star reviews, we still placed an order‚Äîmainly because the Harold‚Äôs on Milwaukee & Wood wasn‚Äôt taking orders that day.
We ordered from UberEats two 6-piece wings with black pepper on everything, plus mild and hot sauce on the side, using the Buy 1 Get 1 Free promotion. Somehow, all four trays were disappointing. The chicken was dark, bitter, and tasted like it had been fried in old grease. The crust was extremely hard‚Äîmore like it had been cooked earlier, left sitting around, and then dropped back in the fryer. Nothing about it tasted fresh, or even close to the Harold‚Äôs standard I‚Äôve known for two decades.

What really made me shake my head is that most Harold‚Äôs locations proudly display the famous sign: ‚ÄúAll orders cooked fresh to order ‚Äî 20 minutes or more.‚Äù It‚Äôs practically a Harold‚Äôs cultural landmark at this point. But this location must have reinvented the slogan, because nothing in our order tasted ‚Äúfresh to order.‚Äù If anything, it tasted more like ‚Äúsat for 20 minutes or more‚Äù before being reheated.

I took photos because the difference between this batch and what real Harold‚Äôs should look like is night and day. As someone who has eaten Harold‚Äôs consistently for 20+ years, this was one of the most disappointing Harold‚Äôs experiences I‚Äôve ever had. I really hope the quality improves, because Avondale deserves better than four trays of overcooked, stale-tasting wings.

To Management ‚Ä¶THANK YOU! I‚Äôm back for an update on this location because they truly deserve it! My last review was not as positive but I am glad to say that I have been back to this location two times since my first review and it seems like management made some great changes and I personally appreciate it.. a different set of staff that delivers a much better experience‚Ä¶ I only get the catfish so far and it is consistently delicious. I‚Äôm grateful that I don‚Äôt have to always go outside of my community to get the great food experience I deserve!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 808 E 79th St, Chicago, IL 60619, USA
reviews: 3 wings was 7.71 they told me 8 dollars even which is not a big difference yet prices went up. He told me I might as well get a 4 piece for 10 dollars when the menu states 8.50. They are always late with food and never give lemon pepper. Paid the 10 for my 4 wings. ‚ù§Ô∏è I just won‚Äôt be back nor refer this location to anyone again.
They love to sale recooked rib tips! And don‚Äôt answer the phone,so you can‚Äôt even tell them about your order. Only thing fresh was the fries and they was under cooked smh.
I had a late night craving for Harold‚Äôs and this hit the spot üî• I like how they add seasoning to the fries, I haven‚Äôt seen that at other Harold‚Äôs. The men working there were nice too

The chicken batter is so properly seasoned the lemon pepper has has this sweet but lemony salty savory. It‚Äôs so good and you have to get the mild sauce on it get the mild sauce. I‚Äôm so sorry I don‚Äôt have any photos. It‚Äôs like the moment I got the chicken and got in the car. I literally inhaled it while I was driving back to my hotel room, so Harold do y‚Äôall thing.

This was the worst Harolds I ever ever had
The chicken didn't taste like Harolds it tasted like I cooked it at home. The breast was super large and dry
The mild sauce on the fries was totally different than the mild sause I was given on the side. I wish I could upload the order I trashed and wasted $ on. I will not use Uber eats again it wouldn't say the address of the harolds BC I would have never ordered from that store. Maybe that's why they don't t
have a number attached to their store
BEWARE!!!!!!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 9151 S Ashland Ave, Chicago, IL 60620, USA
reviews: When I placed my order the cook was distracted by a phone call about his family members in Danville and selling their furniture. While listening to his call and the wait time for my order, I knew my order would be wrong!!! The woman that worked the register asked him what was the order in front of her and he said gizzard and wing combo. She informed him that it was a large gizzard and 6 wings he told her to just take the wings off!!! None the less my large gizzard is now a small gizzard I wanted them fried soft and they are hard as bricks‚Ä¶. The cook had the nerve to open the door to tell me that a large gizzard come in a combo. No refunds and no recooking even if they messed up your order!!!!! Used to be my favorite but, I‚Äôm never going back!!!!

I used to be a Harold's chicken addict. I could tell you which chicken shack had the best chicken, which one had the best gizzards. This chicken shack food I ordered on 5/5/25 was terrible. I should have had tacos. I ordered the chicken and gizzard combo with mild sauce. I was told 15 mins the food would be ready. When I got to my destination and opened the bag. I didn't know if they gave me a chicken or a Cornish hen wing. The wings were so small. The fries were half sized. My friend asked me,'Did they have any whole french fries?' I laughed. The gizzards were just ok. The two wings on the picture made its way to the garbage, along with some fries and gizzards. I don't have to return to this location. I know a bar that sells chicken wings and gizzards MUCH better than this Harold's.

My people we got to do better, lets not say we cook to order and refry the same wings you cooked this morning. I paid for 40 bucks for 16 wings and 2 hot peppers, I should‚Äôve checked my food but I was so hungry that I was ready to go home and eat. Got to my location and they had given me some old chicken. To top it off the lady who took my order was outside smoking a cigarette and didn‚Äôt wash her hands when she returned. Luckily someone else came in and packed my chicken. This experience has been a first for this location but unfortunately I will not be patronizing this location ever again. Please do better Harold‚Äôs chicken #4
Me and my grandmother have eaten their chicken 2-3 times now. The best Harold's I've had in years for sure!

My Daughter said this place just reopened and they are REALLY GOOD. I stopped In after work today I placed an order @4:49pm for a 1/2 Reg Salt & Pepper Only.  At 5:17pm I got my food went to the car checked my order it was Loaded With Mild Sauce.. I took it back told them I have the wrong order they told me their ticket has mild sauce on it.  I showed the guy my Receipt that showed Salt & Pepper Only. They apologized and cooked me a new order unfortunately I didn't leave until 5:48= 1 Hour for food that had No Flavor. I was not Happy I don't think I'll be going back. I only waited b/c my Daughter said Mom it's gonna be Good NOT SO MUCH!!!
Mz.Sand

locations.name: Harold‚Äôs Chicken & Sports Bar
locations.address: 16200 S Cicero Ave, Oak Forest, IL 60452, USA
reviews: The food was great! This is an actual Harold's Chicken Shack. They had a special of buy 6 wings get 6 wings free. They also serve drinks. I've been there before and the drinks weren't that good. This time the drinks were good. This is the best Harold's in this area.

Let me add this to the review.  On the menu they specifically say that it includes coleslaw.  I love coleslaw with barbecue.  I have never received coleslaw in my order at any time. I have been there.  This last time I did ask for coleslaw and I wanted them to make sure it was in my order.  It was not in my order.  If you want coleslaw make sure you ask for it and make sure they put it in there before you leave.  On the other hand, everything is fantastic. The chicken is awesome.  The service is great.  They cook it when you order.  Don't forget to ask for lunch specials if you're here before 2:00 pm.  The atmosphere here is great.  If you wish to dine in all the chairs are tall.  They have a mini slot machine section, make sure you're 21 if you use it.  The chicken is awesome!

Went to watch the Ravens and Green Bay game. Its a sports bar with no sports. The staff were kind. Ordered 6 wings to go instead, cost $14.29, took about 15 minutes. Fried and flavored very well! Feather included. Not bad or good just blah.

I enjoyed this spot the food was good all but the cole slaw.The service was good, however you can tell that he was overwhelmed. Because he had to handle the Uber eats and customer before him..

Now the music is a good idea however it was loud.We had to talk over the music and they were playing a lot of  unedited music. Which was a little much for me.I  love the idea of what they are trying to promote. Yes this could be a nice after work spot or even a birthday party space.

Invest in your business hire a extra help especially when it's football season you will attract more people of older age and maybe Sunday nights can be a old school night just before you getting ready to start the new week. Overall this Harold's Chicken has great potential of making a whole lot of money with  just with a few changes.

We threw a surprise bday party here on 7/12/25 and a time was had! The food was excellent, the service phenomenal and the atmosphere felt like home. We had a really great time. I appreciate all of the hard work the staff performed to make the party as great as it was. The ladies on the bar were on point and made sure everyone was served efficiently. Everyone was so nice and fun to work with. Thanks again!!!

locations.name: Harold‚Äôs Chicken
locations.address: 1711 E 87th St, Chicago, IL 60617, USA
reviews: If you like your food fresh don't be fooled by the $1 wing special. To get what you pay for! I rather pay more and waiting longer for better quality food. I should have known when I didn't smell the food being cooked and couldn't see any staff or the cashier. Every order was 10 mins.

I came in yesterday on a Friday night, my first-time & requested a half dark chicken with lemon pepper & 2 cans of soda which I ordered separately. I offered my condolences regarding the 55 year old female owner passing...the older female cashier working responded that she didn't know in a nonchalant manner & not a thank U on behalf of the company. I'm like wow... When I got my food 15 mins. later my food was salty with lemon pepper & it didn't even taste like Harold's Chicken either.

The chicken is fresh. I met the owner while I was there, and he was nice and professional.  He takes pride in his restaurant being clean and chicken fresh. It is in a somewhat sketchy neighborhood. However,  it's worth the trip.
I ordered a large gizzard and was extremely disappointed! The gizzards were awful! They had absolutely no taste, very small and hard, no seasoning! Harolds use to have a distinctive taste not these!

I ordered a 10 piece with lots of  sauce. They asked me if I wanted lemon pepper I said yes please. I pulled off and I opened up my bag and I saw that there was just a tiny squeeze of sauce on my chicken. That‚Äôs the whole reason of going to Harold‚Äôs is to get the sauce and there was absolutely no lemon pepper. Why even ask if you‚Äôre not going to put it on there highly disappointed, highly dissatisfied want my money back. Place looks very random down and terrible and the inside

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack Evanston
locations.address: 337 W Howard St, Evanston, IL 60202, USA
reviews:
I don't eat takeout nearly as much as I did pre-COVID so I'm not ordering from here as much. But when I do get a craving for takeout (usually no more than once a month), Harold's French fries with mild sauce and fried mushrooms is often what I want. I ordered from here yesterday, and per usual, these two items did not disappoint.

I've been inside of here MANY times. I like it. I didn't always see people wearing masks during COVID-19, but the one lady (sorta long bob with highlights, I think) who called everybody "sweetie/sweetheart" was so pleasant that I let it slide. I don't know where she is now. I've seen two other women post-COVID who look like they'd rather be anywhere else, but I liked THAT lady. She was the epitome of good vibes. All the guys I've encountered were friendly too. One gave me the nickname "Sides" because he caught on that I never order chicken or fish. (Vegetarian.) I haven't seen him in a long time either.

I would normally give this place 5 stars for the fries, mushrooms and those two, but I ordered cheese sticks that were clearly not cooked. The cheese was cold. The breaded part was lukewarm. It tasted like somebody defrosted them and just put them in the bag. I've gotten cheese sticks from there a number of times, and they were always coked well. Getting marinara sauce was only about 10% of the time though. They are always out.

That's the only reason I'm knocking a couple of stars off. I've yet to figure out how to make fried mushrooms as perfectly as they do. I've tried and failed, and then I order from the experts. So, it's not always perfect in there but I still like it.

First time here and everything was good from the service to the food !! If you‚Äôre familiar with Harold‚Äôs you already know that EACH one is different. This one was good . I got a 4 wing dinner with hot sauce on everything. My only slight issue was coleslaw was a little juicy but still good !! If you‚Äôre in the area I would suggest stopping by .

Canadian here. Heard great things about Harold‚Äôs. :(
The chicken was salty. :( the liver was very livery (but i dont like liver so my 3 stars are just for the chicken and fries and cat fish) the fries were food. The cat fish I enjoyed!
It took about 30+ minutes to get our food‚Ä¶.. i drove there.( which i didnt understand since doordash says you get it in 10?)
The person who took our order was friendly and helpful.
üò¢

Everyone always talks about Harold‚Äôs Chicken! So I wanted to check them out for myself. I went with some friends to finally check them out. And I ordered the 6 piece chicken wings with mild sauce and a 4 piece chicken wing with lemon pepper. I requested that the wings be fried hard, and the wings were pretty good. I tried the French Fries. They were just okay. But overall I‚Äôm glad I went . The wings were tasty!!

I grew up on Harold's Chicken. It is a continued favorite in my family. However, today's order at the Evanston Howard location was an unfortunate dining experience. The Cook was half an hour late. Once, I finally got my 6 wings and fries, one of the wings was completely black!  Not burnt, but BLACK!! Looked dangerous and or diseased! This took all the joy away. from enjoying the rest of my meal. I also want to mention that the nice young lady who took my order and seasoned my food was GREAT! I didn't take back the BLACK wing bc ( let's face it) I am sure they would not have provided a customer friendly remedy. This is verified by all the handwritten signs they have posted in the restaurant (i.e. check your food before you leave...). I was not happy with this visit. If there is a next visit, I will open the bag and check every EVERYTHING!!! I am sadden it has come down to this!!

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack #50
locations.address: 1537 Western Ave, Chicago Heights, IL 60411, USA
reviews: Gizzards slightly undercooked. Service was ok, kinda on the fence may give them another try and tell them to fry hard.

Cashier was rude. She made you not even want to order nothing. The wait was said to be 15 mins.. turned into 45 seemed like they prioritize doordash orders over walk in orders.  Asked for my chicken and gizzards to be fried soft with mild sauce and black pepper there was literally 2 drops of mild sauce for the entire order.  10/10 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND‚ÄºÔ∏è
They always have the pickup orders ready to go on time. Thank you this I don‚Äôt mind waiting but time is money. No issues with items missing.

I had the pleasure of giving this Harold‚Äôs a try today. I was skeptical because of the older reviews but once I saw that it was under new management I decided to give it a try and I‚Äôm glad I did! I was completely impressed with the customer service. From the phone call where I placed my order to my service when I picked it up was wonderful. They were cheerful and eager to assist. Baby then I got home and tried my food! It was Hot and Fresh, The sauce was right and My order was correct! üëèüèæüëèüèæüëèüèæ You guys definitely gained a new customer out of me. Thank you again!
The employees are playing around and making fun of you from the kitchen. They have you ringing the service bell, and they just laugh and make mocking comments.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 13653 S Cicero Ave, Crestwood, IL 60445, USA
reviews: My friends and I visit this location on 10/25/25. Great service from Jamie if I remember that was the bartender/server name. She was 100% awesome the only bartender there. Everything was going great DJ awesome and all. We had been there for about 1 hour or 2 before the cook walked off the job before fulfilling the entire party food order. Jamie didnt show any sign of stress she kept it together and kept apologizing the other guy(comedian)forgot his name was a big help. The security guard stepped in as well, the all kept my friends and myself informed and called in someone to come finish cooking for us whom never received our order. Our food wasn't as pleasant as our other friends but they tried their best to keep us satisfied. I just wanna thank Jamie and the rest of the crew for keeping it professional while keeping us all satisfied‚ù§Ô∏èsee you on 11/15 Jamie & Crew

Cashier don‚Äôt pay attention always on the phone and charge me the regular price for a 4 wings which it suppose to be the lunch special price of $6.99 regular price $9.29
Then somebody she knows comes in and order the 4wings and she gave him the special price ‚Ä¶. Four wings special from 10:30a til 1:30pm

1/13 date
12:15pm time

Do better customer service
Ordered two orders of there chicken nuggets and fries. However they did not add fries. Also ordered 10 wings and fries. Literally gave me 10 fries. It‚Äôs best to go to another Harold‚Äôs location.
Good food and drinks are always Fye!!! The atmosphere is always a vibeüòç The staff is friendly and it‚Äôs always a vibe when I come.

I called in my order and the cashier said 20 mins. When I got there I still had to wait and when I got home there was NO sauce on my chicken when I specifically said ‚Äúsalt, pepper, and mild‚Äù. The fries are not good, but the chicken was fresh. They need to do better and READ.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 15411 Cottage Grove Ave, Dolton, IL 60419, USA
reviews: Ordered through Uber eats on a Wednesday at 12:00 pm. (2) 1/2 dark specials and (1) 1/2 white. First off, it was a plain white bag‚Ä¶no Harold‚Äôs original bag. The food arrived hot and the sauce was evenly spread, but the meat did not taste right. It was very very tough and not fried hard like I asked. I thought I was ordering from 127th and halsted. Never will eat here again.

I went to Harold‚Äôs in Dolton today to pick up an online order.  The lady behind the counter was rude and rolling her eyes. I told her Thank you and she never responded. Rolled her eyes and walked away.  I will not be going back to this Harold's.

Chicken was dark like it was cooked in bad grease. As a matter of fact I‚Äôm sure it was.. Straight up nasty‚Ä¶ You guys should be ashamed of yourselves.. This is Not a Real Harold‚Äôs‚Ä¶someone should report this to corporate!

I rarely give 5 stars. But I have to give them their credit ! I got 6 wings with EXTRA mild sauce ( true Chicagoan) and it was amazing. It was so fresh and the mild sauce was perfect. Very impressed also that I ordered it from Uber eats and it was still very hot.
The food was hot but it definitely doesn't taste like "harolds" definitely don't recommend this location.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken
locations.address: 11817 S Pulaski Rd, Alsip, IL 60803, USA
reviews: am so glad this location opened up‚Äîit‚Äôs great to have them relatively close! While the wait for food can be longer than at some of the less desirable spots nearby, the quality makes it well worth it. The chicken is consistently fresh, hot, and delicious. It‚Äôs definitely a Southwest Side gem!

First time I had ever gone inside this business, 2 patrons were watching a football game on the business TV. The cashier told me my food would be about another 5 minutes. Food was tasty. Packing lot is small.

This is my favorite spot- it‚Äôs clean and everything is super fresh. Inside is super clean. I usually call ahead to order and it‚Äôs ready within 15-20 minutes. Small/shared parking lot, but what I love about this spot is it has a DRIVE THRU so I can pull up when the food is ready! Kayla is super friendly and professional. Always coming here!!

Dec.5 2025 I've been patronizing this place ever since it's been open. I deleted my five star. I come there once or twice a week after work phone order person is rude and this is not the first time. I ordered a 10 wing with light sauce chicken was not freshly cooked and old fries with just a few drops of barbecue sauce on it. Will not be patronizing anymore.

We experienced poor customer service. Cashier was very rude both over the phone and in person. We placed our order by phone but still had to wait about 20 minutes after arriving to pick it up. I had requested extra sauce, but there was barely any on my food. When I asked for more, the employee insisted it was already in the bag ‚Äî however, there was no sauce in the bag at all. This was disappointing and not the level of service we expected.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken Shack
locations.address: 4527 Lincoln Hwy, Matteson, IL 60443, USA
reviews: Waiting area was clean and orderly. Has a few seats. Food was great! Wings were cooked just right. Ask for extra sauce if you're getting it on the side. Service was good but the cashier was a little slow. But it was a Friday night. Highly recommended!

Came in at 8pm on Saturday it was not busy employees were very nice, but they had a fryer full of chicken and a fryer of fries. With it being not busy was unsure of how fresh the food would be ordered a fresh order cook was nice and didn‚Äôt have a problem. But he did not change his gloves when starting the order, that was a turn off.
Restraint looks clean on inside customer side but needs to be deep cleaned and repainted in the cooking area another big turn off. So I just canceled my order and went to the one on Cicero and 163rd

The call in order took an additional 20 minutes waiting time after paying for your food while other call in orders that was paid after me walked in and walked rite out with their food. Plus they didn't put any of the sauces in the bag and the lady waitress walked around as if it wasn't any customers at the counter never said hello to nobody just rude.

It‚Äôs sad, that l stayed on hold and had to hang up because the person picking up the food got there before they took my order. And when she got there, it wasn‚Äôt busy. She ordered the food well done,  and the fries were literally raw. Apparently they were in the fryer for a short time. The price of food is too expensive for bad service and bad food. So sad!!!

I went in here being very nice.  I‚Äôm very particular about my food i watched them doing wrong when they put sauce all over my food when I asked for it on the side.  I let that slide still being nice I asked the girl taking my order at the time if she can give me a pop because they were doing wrong she said no, we don‚Äôt give nothing free.  When I get get home it‚Äôs lemon pepper all over my food in which I didn‚Äôt ask for.  I called the manager and he was very dismissive even thru my niceness he had no answers and hung up on me.  Again I was respectful and nice the whole time.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken On Clinton
locations.address: 115 S Clinton St, Chicago, IL 60661, USA
reviews: Outstanding service.  The Chicken is always piping hot and fresh.  Ordering takes about 15 minutes.  They have also set up cameras so you can see your meal being prepared.  I will never again go to another chicken place in the area.  They also have lunch specials from 10am-4pm, Monday through Saturday.
this place is CLOSED...idk why Google still has it listed

worst experience ever. long wait, bland dry chicken, somewhat over cooked, no sides of sauce so the tiny bit they put on was it, which you didn‚Äôt get any flavor from, and the long wait was fine until it seemed our food had been sitting for quite awhile before we got it. was recommended from someone who used to live in chicago but that was the worst chicken spot experience i‚Äôve ever had.
It's shut down. Don't waste your time
Very good. Ordered the 1/4 white dinner and food was fried to perfection and the restaurant was clean. Will return after Lent.

locations.name: Harold's Chicken shack
locations.address: 1126 S Grand Ave E, Springfield, IL 62703, USA
reviews:
Update 5 stars to 2: After almost 2 months in operation this restaurant has been came a typical Springfield restaurant. Serving cold food, incorrect orders at a rate of 50% to 75% and non-existent customer service.  They put hot meat on top of cold fries. They constantly do not put sauce on orders. Sauce on and sauce on the side are 2 different products, adding sauce afterward does not create the same chemical reaction. On my last visit I waited over 40 minutes for my food because they made a mistake in the back and gave my food to another customer. You can hear EVERY SINGLE THING they say in the back. I stood there and listened to them give my food away. Then give me cold fries after waiting 40 minutes while they are counting down to closing time an hour before close.

Finally the taste of the mild sauce and the season of the chicken is starting to vary wildly.

I have called and spoke to management before, they don't care. Check your order before you leave and make hope the "good" cook is on duty.

Original review :
This Harold's is exactly what you would get in the city. As good as 87th, made correctly unlike Hyde Park. Everything is seasoned and cooked perfectly. The wait is long because of COVID but they seem to be improving the process. They aren't taking call in orders which really sucks but I understand. This is probably the best thing to happen to Springfield in 2020. If you love Harold's, don't hesitate to visit.

Don‚Äôt go here! They will charge you $1.50 for extra mild sauce but don‚Äôt put any extra mild sauce on there. I ordered 10 wings with heavy mild sauce. 5 wings had some sauce on there and the others had NO sauce on there. The owner stated she will not refund my money because I didn‚Äôt call until the next morning or return the food. I didn‚Äôt get my food until almost 9 pm last night and called about it this morning AFTER I realize I was charged for extra sauce  that I didn‚Äôt receive.

The owned is getting over on customers over charging them maybe because she‚Äôs in a financial hardship but that isn‚Äôt my fault nor concern. I will not be returning to this rip off restaurant and I will be getting my money BACK!

By far the best chicken wings I‚Äôve had in Springfield, combined with the hot sauce and lemon pepper seasoning it made for a great lunch. The food was priced greatly as well. It was empty when I came and ordered which is a shame considering the quality of the food. The community should rally around spots like these before all we‚Äôre left with are McDonald‚Äôs and burger kings on every corner.

I was craving some hometown food and found this Harold‚Äôs. I went inside to order and the food was very reasonable but as I sat outside to wait on my food I started reading reviews, upon doing that I noticed a lot of comments of food not being hot which mines was hot, I seen reviews about chicken being dark fried to hard like it was in dirty grease and it definitely looked like it was fried in dirty grease. The catfish combo said 4 piece and I‚Äôm thinking I‚Äôm getting 4 pieces of fish and it was like 4 fish tenders and the fries was cooked hard and the sauce didn‚Äôt taste original. It was a total disappointment and I wouldn‚Äôt recommend going here. If you‚Äôre going to buy into a franchise at least try and keep up the quality of food to match with the name you‚Äôre using.

I went in tonight after a very long day. I must say many bad moments interrupted my day so I was pretty down going to get food for the family. Big John and Rico were very welcoming, professional and clean. I noticed John and Rico was their hands a few times and they had on masks. We enjoyed the food and I enjoyed the experience. Keep it up y‚Äôall. It‚Äôs the little things that can make one‚Äôs day/night just a little better.
Thank y‚Äôall. Oh yeah and the presentation of the food‚Ä¶on point üëåüèø
